data.name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - MiG-35D Super Fulcrum Se
data.detailed_description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.

Contains the following:
- Playable Aircraft: MiG-35D Super Fulcrum
A multirole jet fighter developed as a variant of the MiG-29. In addition to an expanded wing area, the craft boasts reinforced parts and has been retrofitted with a new thrust vectoring turbo engine, giving it greater maneuverability and offensive capabilities compared to the original model.
- Also includes 7 skins, including the special "Tiger" skin.

This aircraft can equip the SAAM, 6AAM, or 4AGM as its special weapon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
